duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver customer orders on time and ensure product quality and accuracy.
Operate delivery truck and unload products with a hand truck.
Perform manual heavy lifting and make frequent stops during work shift.
Collect payments and maintain accurate delivery records.
Maintain compliance with DOT regulations and FMCSA Clearinghouse requirements.

education_certification.credential: Valid CDL A with necessary endorsements and DOT qualifications.
